**About me: **

Welcome to my website! I am Maggie Wu and I am a student at Utah Valley University majoring in Biology. My career goal is to become a dentist with passion for creating stronger communities and smiles. 
I am originally from Taiwan, I moved to the U.S. in 2017. Growing up in diverse backgrounds has shaped my perspective and commitment to serving people from diverse backgrounds.
